auto_bind_nxm: Automatically bind to "Mod Manager Download" Buttons on Nexus Mods on Startup
empty_translator_api_key_text: The selected Translator API requires an API key! Please enter one and try again.
invalid_path_text: Path to Portable MO2 Instance is invalid!
keep_logs_num: Number of newest log files to keep
no_config_required: No configuration required for this Translator API.
output_path_not_empty: The selected Output Path is not empty! Its contents will be deleted when continuing!
restart_hint: A restart is required for the changes to take effect.
restart_text: SSE-AT must be restarted for the changes to take effect! Restart now?

Path for Temporary Folder
(for Downloads and co., will be wiped after exit!)
use_masterlist: Use global Masterlist from GitHub Repository (recommended)
use_spell_check: Enable Spell Checking in Translation Editor
